body.name: PackIt Freezable Bottle Cooler for Breastmilk and Formula, Polka Dots, Built with EcoFreeze Technology, Collapsible, Reusable, Zip Closure and Top Handle, Fits up to four, 5 oz Bottles
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 13 hrs 2 mins
features: THE BAG THAT’S AN ICE PACK: The Freezable Breastmilk and Formula Cooler features PackIt’s patented EcoFreeze Technology, with built-in ice packs that create a fridge-like cooling system that keeps milk cool for hours.

SIMPLE AND EASY TO USE: Take the stress and worry out of storing breastmilk or formula on the go. No ice packs needed! Just Freeze, Pack, and Go! Simple care: the interior wipes clean, spot clean exterior.

DESIGNED BY MOMS: This cooler features a top carrying handle, a zippered closure to lock in cool, dry air, and a clear front pocket for name and date card. This smart cooler is the ideal solution for moms on-the-go.
2.8 LITER CAPACITY: Chills up to four, 5 oz breastmilk and formula bottles. Bottles not included. Measures 7” L x 8” W x 5” H while open and 7” L x 8.5” W x 2” H while collapsed.

NONTOXIC: Like all PackIt products, the Freezable Bottle Cooler is made from nontoxic gel and gel liner built into the walls: the entire bag freezes! Made PVC free, BPA free, phthalate, and lead free.
body.description: Take the stress and worries out of storing breastmilk or formula for your baby. PackIt's Freezable Breastmilk and Formula Cooler is the first fully freezable cooler bag: no separate ice packs needed! PackIt's Freezable Breastmilk and Formula cooler is the ideal solution for Caregivers on the go. It chills up to four (4) 5oz bottles of breastmilk or mixed formula for hours. (Note: PackIt's Freezable Cooler Bag is designed to fit Medela Breast Pump breastmilk bottles- bottles are not included. Cooling results can vary with brand and size go bottle). The secret to simple cooling is PackIt's patented cooling technology. Freezable gel is permanently built into the walls of the breastmilk and formula cooler bag so you’ll never need to buy separate freezable ice packs or gel packs again! It is easy to use. Simply flatten and freeze overnight (12 hours), then pack when ready to go. For additional storage space when packing, flatten and fold down the interior freezable divider. A clear pocket on the front for a for name and date card allows you identify your bag in workplace or daycare fridges. A zippered closure locks in cool, dry air. This soft-sided breastmilk and formula cooler bag is made with nontoxic gel and gel liner. Like all PackIt products, the Breastmilk cooler is made from PVC free, BPA free, phthalate, and lead free (UL #B80321985, 12/5/2019) materials. PackIt's Freezable Breastmilk and Formula Cooler measures 8 inches wide, 5.5 inches tall and 6.5 inches deep. Care and cleaning is simple: wipe thoroughly or hand wash the interior and spot clean exterior. Allow bag to dry completely before freezing. Not machine or dishwasher safe. Breastmilk Storage Bottles are not included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps milk very cool & fresh
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little cooler. The ice packs are thick and keep milk at good, cool, temp. Great quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, cute, great for working moms.
reviews.reviewText: I had been keeping my eye on this product for awhile going back and forth on whether or not I wanted to buy it and if I should just use a regular old lunch box or not. I ended up misreading the amount of vacation hours I had left for my leave and had to go back a lot sooner than I had planned, three days short of 5 weeks, and bought this right before my first day. I haven’t actually used it yet as I got called into work early so it arrived while I was at work and I used an ice chest but I just got home and opened it up and set everything up to make sure it’s going to fit everything great. Holds my four 6 ounce bottles AND my pump parts with the divider down! It did take some rearranging but it fits! Where I work we don’t have a fridge or a pumping room so I have to make due as much as I can and this is going to help soooo much. I stuck it in the freezer for just a few minutes before realizing I should make sure everything fits really quickly and it was already cold! I almost didn’t buy it because other reviews said only the top and bottom are insulated and not the sides but the whole entire thing is an ice pack, yes even the sides. It is on the heavy side because of it being all gel packs but it’s not like I’m carrying it around 24/7, I’m just taking it into work and back home. I will definitely be buying other products from them in the future.Edit: I ended up using it the entire year I breastfed and it stayed COLD for 8+ hours in my room temp locker! Fantastic buy, I recommend them to everyone I know that is having a baby and plans on breastfeeding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used this to bring frozen breast milk on a flight. It was only suppose to be a 4 hour flight but with travel time and delays it took 10+ hrs to get home. All of the milk stayed frozen!! Definitely worth buying!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Took this bag on a 10hr trip requiring TSA checks and layovers. Going through TSA was easy. The agent just asked me if the bag was completely frozen and that was it. It didn’t stay completely frozen for 10hrs for this trip but stayed cold and kept my milk cold.On my way back home, my trip with the bag out of the freezer was about 9hrs long. I brought back frozen breast milk and placed the bags sideways in a gallon zip lock bag for any possible spills. It fit my 40oz of milk very well. The middle flap folded down one way and didn’t effect the way the frozen milk sat in the bag. The bag did stay frozen/cold for the most part. It didn’t keep all of my breastmilk frozen but it didn’t completely thaw it either. The unfrozen ones were slushy and the bags of milk that I pumped later stayed cold. Going through TSA with frozen breastmilk in the bag was easy. I just had to place the whole bag in a separate bin and it went through the XR machine with no questions or stops.Overall, I’d say it’s a great bag!Pros:•flap in the middle of the bag folds either way•entire insulation (inside the bag) is an ice pack•easy to carry because of the handle•remained frozen for the most part (for 10hrs~)•kept milk frozen/cold (for 10hrs~)•every day use•strong zipper•fits fairly decent amount of milk (for me, 40oz~ /10 bags of frozen milk laying side ways with 2 bags of fresh milk)•washable•easy to freeze (literally throw the entire bag into the freezer)Cons:•heavier due to the entire insulation being an ice pack•doesn’t keep milk frozen for 12hr dayI included photos of how the bag looks like when it gets delivered. The video shows the inside and how the entire bag is insulated. Also included photos of how the bag looks like with frozen bags of breastmilk inside and how the bag looks after I zip it up with the milk inside.

reviews.reviewText: This container was perfect. I don’t remember how many lansinoh bags it held, but in total I brought home 50 oz of milk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this cooler in May 2018 when preparing to travel to Yellowstone with my then 9-month-old. I was exclusively pumping and heard this product was amazing. It lived up to all my expectations during that trip. Fast forward several years. That first baby is now 5 and an older sister to my 8-month-old. I continue to use this bag everyday at work to carry my milk home. But what prompted me to write this review is this: Yesterday we went to Animal Kingdom. I was able to fit 3 8-oz Dr. Brown’s bottles (with travel caps only, not nipples and stems - those were in a separate bag) into the bag. I packed the cooler at 8am and unpacked it about 9:30pm. The bags of fresh milk that I had added throughout the day were perfectly cold. Granted, we had pleasantly cool weather (about 75 and overcast), but still - it stayed cold all day. We are headed home today and it is crammed full with 3 bottles and 4 bags of milk, but it capacity is outstanding. I already tell everyone I know who pumps that they need this cooler, but now I love it even more! If you are pumping and working or traveling, you need this pump! (Also - on that original trip we flew to Yellowstone, and I didn’t need to fight with TSA about ice packs. Amazing!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for pumping on a bachelorette trip. I have a spectra pump and this fit my pump parts and two bottles with some spare room for a few bags of milk. I wanted to be able to pump while we were out and about without having to clean my pump parts each time. I typically refrigerate my pump parts between use at work and wash them at the end of the day which saves a lot of time. This helped to mimic that while on the go away from a refrigerator for hours at a time. I ended up pumping and dumping on the trip, because I didn’t want to have to worry about lugging a bunch of milk back. If you plan to save your milk, you will want a bigger cooler. Worked great for what I needed it for and kept my pump parts and milk cold for over 6 hours.
Excelente calidad, me encantó mantiene la leche fresca hasta llegar. A casa bonito diseño compatible con Avent
Worked great and stayed very cold for a 4 hour car trip in summer. Fit four 4 oz Philips Avent bottles plus dome lids no problem.

Love the pack it products. Wish this one was an inch higher to accommodate a wider variety of bottles without having to lie them on their side.We pack 4 Kiinde bags, 1 Kiinde holder and 4 nipples in every day.
Justo lo que necesitaba, guarda muy bien la temperatura
Muy pequeña y debo usar bloques enfriadores para que dure
